name: NARNG for Spectrum Next
description:
Literally the last PRNG you'll ever need… assuming you need a number between 1 and 5233 and not including 5000, then this is perfect. Oh, also it takes a while to get the number too.

Rescue the Numerics from the evil Numberwang and their glitch field, and your reward? A single Numeric, forever indentured to you. Play wisely…

(yes, this was for a pseudo competition)

Controls

Keyboard and joystick supported. Space (or fire button) to fire. 

Hit break to restart (if you actually want to play it more than once!!!)
